creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
markings: Artist’s seal: サクラ {Sakura} | Censor seal: 申五改
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: The Syllabary Copybook of the Treasury of Loyal Retainers (Kanadehon Chūshingura 仮名手本忠臣蔵)
signed: 一魁斎芳年筆 {Ikkaisai Yoshitoshi hitsu}
text: Actors Nakamura Tsuruzō I as Ono Kudayū (R), Kataoka Nizaemon VIII as Ōboshi Yuranosuke (C), and Onoe Kikugorō IV as Okaru (L). Related to the play Kanadehon Chūshingura 仮名手本忠臣蔵, performed at the Nakamura Theater in the 4th month of 1860.
title: Seventh Act
